about_the_game:
This is the soundtrack for Onion Games' instant-death action game Mon Amour.
Soothe your sorry soul with the seamless stylings of improvised vocal jazz!
Mon Amour features a never-ending, ever-changing stream of scat-singing, and its all in this soundtrack. 21 tracks, including arranged and karaoke versions of the theme song "Tolerant World" sung by Mie Sonozaki, that voice sample, "Melon Barrier!", and more!
